cms.emailtemplate.EmailTemplatePlainText:
Pages have been submitted for translation. The source text and instructions are enclosed in a ZIP file.
This submission was created with priority {% GetTranslationPriority(Submission.SubmissionPriority) |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)3c6ef5c820f280c5ddf22f77a828cc2408bd5df31b4434f6990db08d7fe46102%} and is due by {% Submission.SubmissionDeadline |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)f3b61b27d2b670dd143a4fcb6eeb7e383b48d62041ef4c37d902ac8562f7152b%}.
To upload a ZIP archive with the completed translation, go to the following URL {% SubmissionLink %}.
